Burnsville.Abdallah Candies: Abdallah Candies is a 4th-generation, family-owned chocolatier and confectionery in Burnsville, Minnesota. It was established in Minneapolis by Lebanese immigrant Albert Abdallah and his wife of Swedish descent, Helen Trovall, as the Calhoun Candy Depot in 1909. The company was renamed Abdallah Candy Company in 1916.
